about_the_game:
Little Gods asks players to take the role of one little god in a galaxy of many, whose followers are doomed by the Fates to search for a new home among the stars.
As you guide your followers in a vessel from their doomed planet to a new home you'll need to protect them while also managing the vessels power, fuel, and technology as you discover and escape diverse planets and places; and encounter and overcome the gods, creatures, and obstacles that inhabit those worlds.

MANIFEST MOMENTS

“…each world a source of power, we search for one new and unclaimed…”
Traversing the galaxy world by world you will stop at each to discover their bounties, collect new followers, refuel your vessel, and to (you-willing) grant your flock a moment of calm in their adventure.

GUIDE THY VESSEL

“…and in our belief we inspired our salvation, the Vessel…”
While your followers inspired in you the creation of the vessel, you will have to fly it. Throughout each flight, you will need to exercise your omnipotence: adjusting to each world's changing gravity, atmosphere, and obstacles; and balancing the vessel's power use and fuel consumption as you collect belief for your followers to evolve its abilities.

BUILD WITH BELIEF

“…the yolk of creation, it seeps out from the stars and we mould it to our needs…”
In this galaxy belief is physical and you’ll it use to create anything your followers are inspired to ask for. Your follower's vessel Golem is made from it and so are the upgrades that you will evolve its abilities with, but be careful... If your vessel can no longer fly, your followers lose their belief and so will be lost all that was made from it.

  • OS: OS 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 (4 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M390 (2048 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: As one little god in a galaxy of many, you must lead your followers from their doomed planet to a new home, at each stage of your journey: an opportunity to build belief and improve your follower's vessel, to meet with other gods and their followers, and to discover why the Fates destine your end.
